Welcome to `projoint`, our one-stop conjoint shop! In this blog we're going to go discuss all things `projoint`: exciting applications using our software, methodological innovations, development notes. We will also highlight published and working papers that use `projoint`, so let us know if you would like to be featured on our blog.

More to come soon!
